title: Should I Buy My Son a Car?
description:
Brandon is wondering if he should reward his smart, kind, well-behaved 16-year-old with a car. - Dr. Laura: "Don't deprive your son of the pride that comes with working hard for his first car."

Did you work for your first car or was it given to you? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment.
